doc:
Ryan Stiles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ryan_Stiles 0 Ryan Lee Stiles (born April 22, 1959) is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, producer and director whose work is often associated with improvisational comedy. He is best known for his career and co-production work on the American and British versions of Whose Line Is It Anyway? and the role of Lewis Kiniski on The Drew Carey Show. He played Herb Melnick on the CBS comedy Two and a Half Men and was a performer on the show Drew Carey's Improv-A-Ganza. Ryan_Lee_Stiles ( born April_22_,_1959 ) is a_Canadian-American_actor , comedian , producer_and_director whose_work is_often_associated with improvisational_comedy . He is_best_known for his_career_and_co-production_work on the_American_and_British_versions of Whose_Line Is It Anyway ? and the_role of Lewis_Kiniski on The_Drew_Carey_Show . He played Herb_Melnick on the_CBS_comedy Two and a_Half_Men and was a_performer on the_show Drew_Carey 's_Improv-A-Ganza .
